title: SalesRep ODS Data Model Schema
description: This Schema defines the SalesRep data in ODS

CustomerAccountNumber.description: The CustomerAccountNumber within the source system

CustomerAccountName.description: The CustomerAccountName within the source system

CategoryType.description: Category Type for an Account. Example : Hardgoods

CategoryID.description: The unique ID of the category type for an Account

ResourceType.description: The resource type of the sales rep. Example: FIELD_SALES

ResourceTypeID.description: The unique ID for the  resource type of the sales rep

ResourceName.description: The customer sales rep Name associated to the customer for each category

ResourceID.description: The unique ID usually EBS USER ID of the customer sales rep Name associated to the customer for each category

isPrimary.description: Denotes if the sales rep for the customer is primary

CurrencyCode.description: The currency code associated to the customer
